languages.text: "Господин Эдельтрад... нет. Мы были неразлучны все время с момента, когда {name} освободил{mf|ся|ась} от козней Кунрада. Лорд-капитан пала от другой руки... и клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g}, я догадываюсь, от чьей!"

traits.locale_text: "Господин Эдельтрад... нет. Мы были неразлучны все время с момента, когда {name} освободил{mf|ся|ась} от козней Кунрада. Лорд-капитан пала от другой руки... и клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g}, я догадываюсь, от чьей!"

languages.text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"
languages.original_text: "Господин Эдельтрад... нет. Мы были неразлучны все время с момента, когда {name} освободил{mf|ся|ась} от козней Кунрада. Лорд-капитан пала от другой руки... и клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g}, я догадываюсь, от чьей!"

traits.locale_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Voigtvir's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

"Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Voigtvir's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

"Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

"Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

"Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

languages.text: “艾德萨德大师……并非如此。自从{name}从昆拉德的阴谋中脱身之后，我们就一直呆在一起。舰长大人是被另一个人杀死的……而且，{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}在上，我猜得出来是谁干的！”
languages.original_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

traits.locale_text: “艾德萨德大师……并非如此。自从{name}从昆拉德的阴谋中脱身之后，我们就一直呆在一起。舰长大人是被另一个人杀死的……而且，{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}在上，我猜得出来是谁干的！”

languages.text: «Maestro Edelthrad... no. Hemos permanecido a la vista de los demás desde que {name} se salvó de las argucias de Kunrad. La Lord Capitán murió a manos de otro... ¡y por el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} que puedo señalar al culpable!».
languages.original_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

traits.locale_text: «Maestro Edelthrad... no. Hemos permanecido a la vista de los demás desde que {name} se salvó de las argucias de Kunrad. La Lord Capitán murió a manos de otro... ¡y por el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} que puedo señalar al culpable!».

languages.text: 「エデルスラド様…違います。{name}様がクンラッドの陰謀から逃れて以降、我々がお互いを見失ったことはありません。ロード・キャプテンは他の誰かの手によって殺されたのです…そして{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に誓います！それが誰の手によるものだったのか推測できます！」
languages.original_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・エデルスラド…違います。クンラッドの陰謀から{name}逃れて以降、我々がお互いを見失ったことはありません。ロード・キャプテンは他の誰かの手によって殺されたのです…そして{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}により、私にはそれが誰の手だったのか推測できます！」
「エデルスラド様…違います。{name}様がクンラッドの陰謀から逃れて以降、我々がお互いを見失ったことはありません。ロード・キャプテンは他の誰かの手によって殺されたのです…そして{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に誓います！それが誰の手によるものだったのか推測できます！」

languages.text: « Vous vous trompez, maître Edelthrad. Nous ne nous sommes pas quittés des yeux depuis que {name} s'est {mf|libéré|libérée} des machinations de Kunrad. C'est une autre main qui a tué la seigneure-capitaine... et par le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, je crois savoir à qui elle appartient ! »
languages.original_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous trompez, maître Edelthrad. Nous ne nous sommes pas quittés des yeux depuis que {name} s'est {mf|libéré|libérée} des machinations de Kunrad. C'est une autre main qui a tué la seigneure-capitaine... et par le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, je crois savoir à qui elle appartient ! »

languages.text: "Herr Edelthrad ... nein. Wir haben einander nicht aus den Augen verloren, seit {name} Kunrads Komplott durchschaut hat. Der Lord Captain wurde durch eine andere Hand gefällt ... und beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g}, ich kann mir denken, wessen Hand es war!"
languages.original_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

traits.locale_text: "Herr Edelthrad ... nein. Wir haben einander nicht aus den Augen verloren, seit {name} Kunrads Komplott durchschaut hat. Der Lord Captain wurde durch eine andere Hand gefällt ... und beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g}, ich kann mir denken, wessen Hand es war!"

languages.text: "Üstat Edelthrad, yanılıyorsunuz. {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, Kunrad'ın hain planından kurtulduğundan beri hep yan yanaydık. Lord Kaptan'ın ölümünde başkasının parmağı var ve {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} adına, o parmak kime ait, bir tahminim mevcut!"
languages.original_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since {name} broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I can surmise whose hand it was!"

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Edelthrad, yanılıyorsunuz. {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, Kunrad'ın hain planından kurtulduğundan beri hep yan yanaydık. Lord Kaptan'ın ölümünde başkasının parmağı var ve {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} adına, o parmak kime ait, bir tahminim mevcut!"

languages.original_text: "Master Edelthrad... no. We have remained in each other's sight ever since  broke free from Kunrad's schemes. The Lord Captain was killed by another's hand... and, by the Golden Throne, I can surmise whose hand it was!"
